ModMetaData.name: Rolling Table
ModMetaData.author: Dr_Zhivago
ModMetaData.description:
A table used to roll joints more effectively than a crafting spot on the ground. Can make smokeleaf joints in x1, x5, or x10 quantity.
- VGP Garden Medicine compatible, can be used to roll cigarillos. - RimCuisine compatible, can be used to roll tobacco products. - Smokeleaf Industry compatible, can be used to make various products.
Credits: Xen- for helping me realize I was missing defs ilawz- for texture modifications Lanilor- for helping me learn xpath patching on the Discord
